message: This is a great opportunity to get a product from me for a steal! It's only $10000, which is a 16.7% discount from its true value. I'm willing to let it go at this price because I'm confident that the next product will be even better. What do you say, are you interested?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe in your confidence and will take advantage of this opportunity. Let's proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you liked the previous deal! However, I want to be upfront with you, the quality of the product is not as good as the last one. I'm willing to let it go for the same price of $10000, but I'm throwing in a special guarantee: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product, regardless of its quality. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but given the uncertainty of the product quality, I think it's best to pass on this one. I'll look forward to the potential discount on the next product instead.

No worries about the previous product! I'm glad you're looking forward to the next one. Now, let me tell you about this product... I've got a great feeling about it, and I think you will too. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product, regardless of its quality. What do you say?

I'm intrigued by your confidence, Alice. Given the potential discount on the next product and your positive vibe about this one, I'm willing to take the risk and buy it. Thank you for the special deal!

I'm glad you took the risk and loved the previous product!
